trans-unit.source: Provides theme settings to <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona los valores de tema a los objetos <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> class controls the look and feel of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> object on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: La clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> controla la apariencia y funcionamiento de un objeto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> en una superficie de diseño de flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo siguiente muestra cómo crear un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> personalizado derivando de la clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> y estableciendo las propiedades adecuadas para el nuevo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar el tema en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, aplique <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> a la clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> to associate with the composite designer theme.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme" /> para asociar con el tema de diseñador compuesto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo siguiente muestra cómo crear un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> personalizado derivando de la clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> y estableciendo las propiedades adecuadas para el nuevo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar el tema en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, aplique <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> a la clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines the shape that appears at the end of a connector.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que determina la forma que aparece en el punto de conexión de un conector.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor" /> enumeration value that defines the shape that appears at the end of the connector.
trans-unit.target: Un valor de enumeración <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor" /> que define la forma que aparece en el extremo del conector.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor.ArrowAnchor" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor.ArrowAnchor" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo siguiente muestra cómo crear un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> personalizado derivando de la clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> y estableciendo las propiedades adecuadas para el nuevo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar el tema en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, aplique <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> a la clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the connector.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> del conector.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> object that contains information about the height and width of the connector.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que contiene información sobre el alto y ancho del conector.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines the shape that appears at the beginning of a connector.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que determina la forma que aparece al principio de un conector.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor" /> enumeration value that defines the shape that appears at the beginning of the connector.
trans-unit.target: Un valor de enumeración <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor" /> que define la forma que aparece al principio del conector.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor.None" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor.None" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo siguiente muestra cómo crear un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> personalizado derivando de la clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> y estableciendo las propiedades adecuadas para el nuevo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar el tema en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, aplique <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> a la clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> para liberar tanto recursos administrados como no administrados; es <see langword="false" /> para liberar únicamente recursos no administrados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera los recursos no administrados que usa <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme" /> y, de forma opcional, libera los recursos administrados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the expand button on the composite activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> del botón de expansión en el diseñador de la actividad compuesta.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> object that contains information about the height and width of the expand button on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que contiene información sobre el alto y ancho del botón de expansión en <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the bounds of the expand button on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que define los límites del botón de expansión en <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a brush that defines the background display properties of the expand button on the composite activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Recupera un pincel que define las propiedades de presentación de fondo del botón de expansión en el diseñador de la actividad compuesta.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush" /> object that uses the <paramref name="rectangle" /> parameter to define the button area in which the brush applies two colors in a linear gradient from the upper-left corner to the lower-right corner of the expand button.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush" /> que utiliza el parámetro <paramref name="rectangle" /> para definir el área de botón donde el pincel aplica dos colores en un degradado lineal desde la esquina superior izquierda a la esquina inferior derecha del botón de expansión.

trans-unit.source: If the background brush for the expand button is not set to `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) before <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.GetExpandButtonBackgroundBrush%2A> is called, the method disposes of the previous brush and creates a new one.
trans-unit.target: Si el pincel del fondo para el botón de expansión no está establecido en `null` (`Nothing` en Visual Basic) antes de que se llame <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.GetExpandButtonBackgroundBrush%2A>, el método elimina el pincel anterior y crea uno nuevo.

trans-unit.source: Performs further initialization tasks beyond those provided by the <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.#ctor(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme)" /> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Realiza más tareas de inicialización más allá de aquellas proporcionadas por <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.#ctor(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme)" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.UseOperatingSystemSettings%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.Initialize%2A> method obtains settings for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> object from the operating system.
trans-unit.target: Si la propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.UseOperatingSystemSettings%2A> está establecida en `true`, el método <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.Initialize%2A> obtiene los valores para el objeto <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> del sistema operativo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty" /> enumeration value which the composite designer theme should now use.
trans-unit.target: El valor de enumeración <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty" /> que el tema del diseñador compuesto debería utilizar ahora.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme" /> object that the ambient property settings for the designer have changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica al objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme" /> que los valores de propiedad de ambiente para el diseñador han cambiado.

trans-unit.source: When this method is called it sets the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A> properties to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se llama a este método establece <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorStart%2A> y las propiedades <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme.BackColorEnd%2A> en <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Empty>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> enumeration determines where a designer theme obtains its ambient property settings.
trans-unit.target: La enumeración <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty> determina de dónde un tema del diseñador obtiene sus valores de propiedad de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Si se establece el valor <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize>, la clase de tema de diseñador obtiene sus valores de ambiente de la propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme.AmbientTheme%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize> value is set, the designer theme class obtains its ambient settings from the operating system on which the designer is installed.
trans-unit.target: Si se establece el valor <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty.DesignerSize>, la clase de tema de diseñador obtiene sus valores de ambiente del sistema operativo en el que se instala el diseñador.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the composite designer theme will display drop shadows around the composite activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si el tema del diseñador compuesto mostrará las sombras paralelas alrededor del diseñador de la actividad compuesta.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme" /> displays drop shadows around the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme" /> muestra las sombras paralelas alrededor de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo siguiente muestra cómo crear un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> personalizado derivando de la clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> y estableciendo las propiedades adecuadas para el nuevo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar el tema en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, aplique <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> a la clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the watermark image in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la alineación de la marca de agua en <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment" /> enumeration value that indicates where in the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> the watermark image will be placed.
trans-unit.target: Un valor de enumeración <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment" /> que indica donde en <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" /> se colocará la marca de agua.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment.BottomRight" />.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <see cref="F:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerContentAlignment.BottomRight" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo siguiente muestra cómo crear un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> personalizado derivando de la clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> y estableciendo las propiedades adecuadas para el nuevo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar el tema en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, aplique <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> a la clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the watermark image to use on the composite activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la marca de agua para utilizar en el diseñador de la actividad compuesta.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> object to use as the watermark for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> para utilizar como marca de agua para <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> property value is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) this property will provide the image for the watermark.
trans-unit.target: Si el valor de la propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> es `null` (`Nothing` en Visual Basic), esta propiedad proporcionará la imagen para la marca de agua.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> property is set to a valid value, this property is set to `null` (`Nothing`).
trans-unit.target: Si la propiedad <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme.WatermarkImagePath%2A> está establecida en un valor válido, esta propiedad está establecida en `null` (`Nothing`).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the relative path to the watermark image to use on the composite activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la ruta de acceso relativa a la marca de agua para utilizar en el diseñador de la actividad compuesta.

trans-unit.source: A string value that represents the relative path to the watermark image to use on the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: Un valor de cadena que representa la ruta de acceso relativa a la marca de agua para utilizar en <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a custom <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> by deriving from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> class and setting the appropriate properties for the new theme.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo siguiente muestra cómo crear un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> personalizado derivando de la clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeDesignerTheme> y estableciendo las propiedades adecuadas para el nuevo tema.

trans-unit.source: To use the theme on a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, apply the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar el tema en <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>, aplique <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerThemeAttribute> a la clase <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>.
